name: Quick Low-Carb Shirataki Noodles with Black Olives and Coconut Aminos
description: This Shirataki black olives noodles dish is a healthful delight, perfect for those on a low-carb, low-sodium, low-sugar, and high-fiber diet. Embrace a healthy lifestyle without sacrificing flavor with this simple yet elegant noodle dish. Ideal for anyone looking for healthy recipes to add to their culinary repertoire.

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse the Shirataki Noodles under cold water for about 1 minute.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Bring a pot of water to boil, add the Shirataki Noodles and cook for 2-3 minutes. Drain and set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Chop the Black Olives into small pieces.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: In a mixing bowl, combine the Coconut Aminos and Black Olives with the Shirataki Noodles. Toss everything together until the noodles are well coated.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4
